original_title: Forbidden Knowledge - From Giants to Atlantis
overview: The history of Planet Earth is not what we have been told throughout the centuries, far from it. From our true origins and evolution, to occult secrets hidden from the masses since time immemorial, the ruling elite have controlled the written accounts of world history from a perspective of knowledge is power, controlling what we learn and perceive as the truth. Explore the shocking research and evidence that reveals what they don't want you to know. A Race of Giants, Atlantis and Ancient Alien Legacy.
title: Forbidden Knowledge - From Giants to Atlantis
